beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: Here's where Crystal Bear breaks you. 192 mi. Zone by zone.
beats.visual: Full route map, then zoom into first zone
beats.editing_note: Start with full route visible, then rapid zoom in. Ominous music hit. Avatar suffering face.

beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 45
beats.narration: Mile 45. Nicolet National Forest Sandy Gauntlet. Sandy, loose Northwoods sections bog down wheels and sap energy. Realize the long night ahead. First mental fatigue sets in.
beats.text_on_screen: MILE 45: Nicolet National Forest Sandy Gauntlet
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

beats.label: ZONE 2: Mile 85
beats.narration: Mile 85. Sunset Transition. Darkness arrives around Mile 80-90 depending on pace. Transition to night riding. Fatigue + darkness + navigation challenges compound. First real test.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Northwoods rolling gravel with sandy sections and overnight navigation challenge

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 2 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 3: Mile 130
beats.narration: Mile 130. Midnight Grind Through Upper Peninsula. Deep into overnight hours. Coldest temperatures. Riding alone in pitch-black forest. Sleep deprivation peaks. Mental battle for survival.
beats.text_on_screen: MILE 130: Midnight Grind Through Upper Peninsula
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Northwoods rolling gravel with sandy sections and overnight navigation challenge

beats.label: ZONE 4: Mile 175
beats.narration: Mile 175. Dawn Zombie Shuffle to Crystal Falls. Sun rises but body is wrecked. Final 17 miles feel endless. Mechanical issues at this stage are crushing. Just want to be done.
beats.text_on_screen: MILE 175: Dawn Zombie Shuffle to Crystal Falls
